item.title: Sales Representatives - Doha, Qatar
item.description:
POSITION PURPOSE

Reporting directly to the Senior Regional Sales Representative, the successful candidate will be part of a growing mobility team and will act as the main point of communication with potential (and existing) Move One corporate clients. The Sales Representative will be responsible for all sales activities in assigned accounts and will manage the quality and consistency of all Move One product and service delivery.

RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS

Present and sell company products and services (moving, relocation, logistics or any other specialized Move One service to current and potential clients in the assigned territory/market segment

Locate or propose potential business deals by contacting potential partners; discovering and exploring opportunities.

Seek out opportunities to increase business in all service areas.

Identify sales prospects and contact these and other accounts as assigned.

Establish and maintain current and potential client relationships.

Help develop and submit professional, clear and effective proposals for current and prospective customers.

Provide a consistently high level of service to Move One customers regarding the entire process of relocation, freight rates, service levels, schedule information and customer inquiries and complaints.

Manage account services through quality checks and other follow-ups.

Identify and resolve client concerns.

Stay up-to-date on new product and service opportunities, special developments, market conditions, competitors’ activities as well as advertising and promotional trends via personal connections and through the reading of pertinent literature.

Communicate new opportunities, special developments, information, or feedback gathered through networking activities to appropriate company staff.

Participate in sales meetings, networking events (inside and outside of core business hours).

Stay current on customer and industry trends.

Understand competitor strategies, capabilities and pricing to better position Move One advantageously.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-11-03
Job Location: Qatar - Doha
Job Role: Sales

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Degree: Bachelor's degree

item.title: Iraq Moving Sales Representative - Baghdad, Iraq
item.description:
Position Purpose


The Sales Representative will be a key member of the mobility team and will serve as the primary point of contact with potential and existing clients. The Sales Representative will be responsible for driving sales activities in assigned accounts and ensuring the quality and consistency of Move One's product and service delivery.


Responsibilities / Duties / Functions Tasks


















































Present and sell cA18:A30
Identify and propose potential business deals by contacting potential partners and exploring opportunities.
Seek out opportunities to increase business in all service areas.
Identify sales prospects and contact assigned accounts.
Establish and maintain relationships with current and potential clients.
Help develop and submit professional, clear, and effective proposals for current and prospective customers.
Provide a consistently high level of service to Move One customers regarding the entire process of relocation, freight rates, service levels, schedule information, and customer inquiries and complaints.
Manage account services through quality checks and other follow-ups.
Identify and resolve client concerns.
Stay up-to-date on new product and service opportunities, special developments, market conditions, competitors' activities, and advertising and promotional trends through personal connections and by reading pertinent literature.
Communicate new opportunities, special developments, information, or feedback gathered through networking activities to appropriate company staff.
Participate in sales meetings and networking events, both during and outside of core business hours.
Stay current on customer and industry trends.
Understand competitor strategies, capabilities, and pricing to position Move One advantageously.

Develop and present value-based proposals, turn customer interest into actions that "close the deal," and ensure the process and quality of customer documentation.

item.title: Regional Financial Accountant - Cameroon x2
item.description:
Process outgoing and incoming customer and vendor invoices as per internal and statutory requirements


 


 


Perform internal control checks on vendor bills such as cost checking in operational system.


 


 


Petty cash and bank transfer responsibility


 


 


Liaise with external auditors/accountants and provide all documents and reports required for the audit and statutory reporting on weekly/monthly/yearly basis and ensure compliance with all rules and regulations


 


 


Communication with different departments, customers, vendors as required


 


 


Reconciliation of Petty cash and Bank reports (all expenses, revenues and other transfers) in financial system D365


 


 


Reconciliation of operational (job related) expenses, in internal systems


 


 


Reconciliation of all Advances given to employees for operational purposes. 


 


 


Booking, reconciliation and clearing of all Prepaids, Deposits, Accruals and other pending accounts on monthly basis 


 


 


Submitting local internal weekly/monthly reports as per internal rules and procedures


 


 


Other duties as reasonably assigned.


 


 


 


 

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-11-02
Job Location: Cameroon
Job Role: Accounting/Banking/Finance

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Degree: Bachelor's degree

item.title: Regional Operations Manager- Africa
item.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS:


- On boarding new projects and implementing and improving operations and administrative support.
- Responsible for ensuring that team understands expectations and consistently meet or exceed KPI’s.
- Monitor and assist in training logistics shipment managers to ensure consistent operation and customer service level
- Responsible to ensure all logistics jobs are managed properly as per administrative and financial internal procedures and requirements
- Assist in development of forms and tools to increase Company and operational efficiency
-Manage all staff reporting to the position so as to effectively recruit, train, evaluate, motivate, delegate and monitor their activities.
- Keep the manager informed of task accomplishment, issues and status
- Work closely with Country managers on vendor selection, management and pricing
-Provide status reporting of team activities against the program plan or schedule
- Monitoring, measure and manage performance and service quality of the team
- Coordinate meetings with the Global Manager to discuss any type of impediments,
- needed resources or issues/delays in completing the task
- Monitor the progress of jobs and services throughout the region - Planning, Execution and Billing.
- Systematic review of the jobs to identify any challenges before hand and discuss the same with team - Proactive and not reactive
- Establish times, places and agendas for planning of the jobs and discuss any challenges with the jobs
- Develop processes, design documentation standards, techniques and tools to support task performance.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-11-01
Job Location: Cameroon
Job Role: Logistics and Transportation

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Nationality: Cameroon

item.title: On Call Destination Consultants- Saudi Arabia
item.description:
Position Purpose


To support employees and their families who are moving to Middle East and to ensure their smooth transition into the new location by providing services including orientation, home finding, school search etc and making the assignee familiar with the local area, culture and customs.


Responsibilities/ Duties /Tasks


Sourcing suitable accommodation for the assignee and family within the budget and timescales agreed.


Ensuring that all properties viewed are on housing itineraries prepared by Move One's preferred real estate agent vendors.


Discussing and confirming that the services being delivered are within the agreed budget and scope of work contracted with the client.


Maintaining consistent contact with the assignee throughout the service.


Recording vital service-related information in Move One's bespoke software system daily by completing comments, statuses, time-tracker, costs, and other fields.


Providing clear and timely updates and service reports to any local Move One clients for whom they are providing services.


Work Requirement


Consultants are expected to use their own cars and valid driving license.


Per Diem Consultants will not work with another Relocation company during their engagement with Move One Relocations.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-10-31
Job Location: Saudi Arabia - Khobar
Job Role: Other

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Degree: Bachelor's degree

item.title: Pet Transport Coordinator
item.description:
JOB SUMMARY: As a Pet Transport Coordinator, you will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service, coordinating pet transportation, and ensuring a smooth and efficient process from initial quote to final delivery. You will play a crucial role in delivering a positive experience for our customers and their beloved pets.


RESPONSIBILITIES:



  1. Quoting and Pricing:


    • Respond promptly to customer inquiries and requests for pet transport quotes.

    • Gather necessary information from customers to provide accurate and competitive quotes.

    • Utilize pricing tools and databases to determine appropriate pricing for pet transport services.

    • Ensure quotes are communicated clearly and effectively to customers.


  2. Quote Follow-Up:


    • Proactively follow up with customers to answer questions, address concerns, and provide additional information as needed in order to secure the business.

    • Maintain a systematic follow-up process to ensure timely responses and increase customer satisfaction.

    • Collaborate with internal teams to address any pricing or logistical challenges and find suitable solutions.


  3. Job Coordination:


    • Oversee and coordinate the entire pet transportation process, from scheduling to final delivery.

    • Liaise with customers, transport providers, and other relevant parties to gather all necessary information and documentation.

    • Monitor and track pet transport shipments to ensure on-time delivery and resolve any potential issues.

    • Provide regular updates to customers regarding the status and progress of their pet's transportation.


  4. Customer Service:


    • Deliver exceptional customer service by providing accurate information, resolving complaints, and addressing customer concerns.

    • Build and maintain positive relationships with customers, agents, transport providers, and internal teams.

    • Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction throughout the entire pet transport process.


  5. Documentation and Record-Keeping:


    • Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of customer interactions, quotes, and transport details in our internal systems.

    • Generate and process necessary paperwork, including contracts, invoices, and shipping documents.



Ensure

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-10-18
Job Location: Kenya
Job Role: Other

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Nationality: Kenya

item.title: Regional Vendor Network Coordinator â€“ Europe & Central Asia
item.description:
POSITION PURPOSE:


 


The Regional Vendor Network Coordinator – Europe & Central Asia will be responsible for managing our regional vendor network in Europe & Central Asia to ensure that we have the right vendors in place to provide our clients with the best possible service at the best price. The position will work closely with our quoting and operations teams to identify new vendors, negotiate rates and tariffs, and develop relationships with existing vendors. You will also be responsible for ensuring that our vendors meet our high standards for service quality and compliance.


 


 


RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS:


 


 


 



  • Identify and evaluate potential vendors based on their capabilities, service quality, price and compliance with our standards.


 


 



  • Negotiate agreements with new vendors and manage ongoing relationships with existing vendors.


 


 



  • Ensure that our vendors meet our high standards for service quality and compliance with regulations and industry standards.


 


 



  • Operate within our company's vendor management system, ensuring that all vendors are registered, vetted, and compliant with our policies and standards.


 


 



  • Regularly monitor vendor performance and implement corrective actions as needed.


 


 



  • Collaborate with our quoting and operations teams to provide our clients with the best possible service.


 


 



  • Develop and implement a strategy for expanding our regional vendor network.


 


 

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-10-16
Job Location: Hungary
Job Role: Support Services

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Nationality: Hungary

item.title: UPS Operations Coordinator- Baghdad
item.description:
Responsibilities


Import Operations:
Manifesting and coordinating custom clearance for shipments going to Baghdad.
Updating arrival information in the UPS system.
Updating government hold exceptions in the UPS system.
Coordinating with UPS Erbil team for custom cleared and hold shipments at Erbil airport.
Coordinating with UPS Erbil team and Move One warehouse for trucking of the MAWB between Erbil and Baghdad.
Creating custom tracker Excel for all custom cleared shipments with duties, charges, and trucking fees.
Creating receipts for custom cleared shipments along with UPS tracking and fees in local currency.
Entering all details in the Custom Tracker Excel and providing supporting documents to Erbil Finance team within 24-36 hours
Checking all tracking shipments once the truck is received at the Move One warehouse in Baghdad.
Providing duties and taxes receipts to drivers for chargeable shipments
Preparing damage inspection reports and photos for evaluation by the Operations Manager.
Performing inbound scans in the UPS system for custom cleared shipments
Updating exception notifications for hold shipments in the Erbil customs.
Scanning shipments in UPS Global Pickup & Delivery (GPD) before delivery.
Handling remote area shipments and following up with delivery agents until delivery is completed.
Running daily Tundra location report for drivers.
Monitoring import exception notifications and closing shipments within 10 days.
Creating free domicile receipts in USD and sending weekly petty cash report to Erbil Finance team.


Export Operations
Creating labels for export walk-in customers in the WorldShip system and collecting advance freight charges.
Conducting physical searches for export shipments and ensuring compliance with restrictions and regulations.
Scanning AWB copy, invoice, and packing list in the UPS system.
Updating pickup scans manually in Tundra TPD for all export shipments.
Departing shipments from Baghdad station and sending pre- alerts to Erbil team.
Resolving customer complaints and issues related to export operations.
Monitoring export exception notifications and closing shipments within 10 days.
Processing return shipments of damaged or return parts from Dell customers back to Erbil Move One warehouse.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-10-11
Job Location: Iraq - Baghdad
Job Role: Logistics and Transportation

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Degree: Bachelor's degree

item.title: Relocations Pricing Coordinator - Abu Dhabi, UAE
item.description:
Position Purpose


As a Pricing Coordinator, your primary responsibility is to support the pricing team by developing accurate pricing proposals, maintaining pricing information, and improving pricing processes.


Responsibilities
Receive, acknowledge, and understand pricing requests from customers such as RMCs, corporates, and the sales team to create accurate pricing proposals or ad-hoc quotes.
Study the data of our customers, like how many times they've used our services in the past two years and rates given to other customers for similar requests, to determine the right pricing.
Prepare and check pricing proposals or ad-hoc quotes, making sure they follow our company guidelines and policies.
Submit the pricing proposals and/or ad-hoc quotes promptly to the right team.
Help negotiate prices with suppliers to find cost-effective solutions.
Keep our pricing information updated in our databases and systems.
Identify cost-saving opportunities and areas for process improvement.
Work with other teams, especially Operations, to make our pricing process smoother and more efficient.
Stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in the industry, especially how RMCs are changing their strategies.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-09-29
Job Location: United Arab Emirates - Abu Dhabi
Job Role: Other

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Degree: Bachelor's degree

item.title: Move Coordinator-Doha, Qatar
item.description:
POSITION PURPOSE

Serve as the single point of coordination for assigned import, export and domestic moves into and out of the local region


RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS

Manage the household goods process from booking to delivery; origin to destination, import, export and domestic.

Counsel clients to ensure the best ongoing experience regarding their household goods shipments, pack outs, deliveries, etc.

Manage the expectations of both domestic and international customers

Liaise with moving operations, customer service reps, sales and crew leaders in order to stay up to date on customer needs, service developments, insurance matters. Attend daily planning meetings with warehouse supervisor, crew manager and Operations Manager to analyze and plan effectively.

Work closely with Pricing Analyst and Quoting department to best price services and jobs for the most cost-effective solutions

Confirming transport and service quotes from agents and vendors, and requesting a discount when possible

Requesting and booking of export and import shipments with agents and vendors

Creating waybill documentation for outgoing and incoming shipments

Checking required customs documentation for import and export shipments

Monitoring documentation for incoming and outgoing shipments

Closing jobs with actual cost calculations

Daily update of electronic files and documents required throughout the cycle of each moving service.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-09-13
Job Location: Qatar - Doha
Job Role: Logistics and Transportation

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Degree: Bachelor's degree

item.title: Accounting Assistant - Central Africa
item.description:
Collecting weekly Petty cash and Bank reports from field offices on weekly basis.


 


 


Booking of Petty cash and Bank reports (all expenses, revenues and other transfers) in financial system.


 


 


Collecting Cash Count Protocol and comparing if real balances of cash are matching with reports balances.


 


 


Reconciliation of operational (job related) expenses, In Track/V3 and check-marking of those expenses in our financial system.


 


 


Communication with field offices for all job related issues.


 


 


Reconciliation of all Advances given to employees for operational purposes. 


 


 


Booking, reconciliation and clearing of all Prepaids, Deposits, Accruals and other pending accounts on monthly basis 


 


 


Submitting local monthly reports, including Profit & Loss; Balance sheet; for countries in charge. Sending monthly reports to Accounting Supervisor by 3rd working day of the month


 


 


Other duties as reasonably assigned.

item.title: On Call Relocation Consultant - Almaty, Kazakhstan
item.description:
Position Purpose


To support employees and their families who are moving to Kazakhstan and to ensure their smooth transition into the new location by providing services including orientation, home finding, school search etc and making the assignee familiar with the local area, culture and customs.


Responsibilities/ Duties /Tasks


Sourcing suitable accommodation for the assignee and family within the budget and timescales agreed.


Ensuring that all properties viewed are on housing itineraries prepared by Move One's preferred real estate agent vendors.


Discussing and confirming that the services being delivered are within the agreed budget and scope of work contracted with the client.


Maintaining consistent contact with the assignee throughout the service.


Recording vital service-related information in Move One's bespoke software system daily by completing comments, statuses, time-tracker, costs, and other fields.


Providing clear and timely updates and service reports to any local Move One clients for whom they are providing services.

item.title: On Call Destination Consultant Kosice x 2
item.description:
Job Title: On Call Destination Consultant


Location: Bratislava, Slovakia


Reporting to:  Global Mobility Manager - Destination Field Consultants Job Description


POSITION PURPOSE


Move One’s Relocation Consultants support new expatriates and their families prior to their assignment by introducing them to the community, show them potential neighborhoods, support them with finding a home and sourcing schools and become familiar with the area, culture and customs. Once the expatriate and/or family relocate, the consultant and relocation team continue to offer support services to ensure a smooth settling in process.


 


RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS


Answer any queries, which the transferee may have about the relocation process and his/her expectations about the new location.


Find neighborhoods, residences, schools/childcare for the transferee relevant to their needs and priorities, coordinating with the relocation team to provide optimum service. Coordinate all relevant visits and a suitable itinerary for the transferee based on the agreed services. These visits include, but are not limited to, rental properties, schools, neighborhoods, clubs, etc.


Keep in constant communication with your assigned transferee(s) so that the most suitable itinerary is presented that meets their needs and expectations.


Accompany the transferee on each day’s orientation, home-finding or school search and/or settling-in or familiarization tour.


Follow up to answer additional questions and inform the relocation team and your assigned in-house Relocation Coordinator of the outcome, questions, challenges, needs analysis, follow up schedule, etc.


 


All Move One Employees and Consultants are expected to:


Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments.


Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers.


Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations.


Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision.


 

Job Details

Posted Date: 2023-05-05
Job Location: Slovak Republic
Job Role: Customer Service and Call Center

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career

item.title: Regional Operations Manager- Europe, Balkan & Central Asia
item.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS:


- On boarding new projects and implementing and improving operations and administrative support.
- Responsible for ensuring that team understands expectations and consistently meet or exceed KPI’s.
- Monitor and assist in training logistics shipment managers to ensure consistent operation and customer service level
- Responsible to ensure all logistics jobs are managed properly as per administrative and financial internal procedures and requirements
- Assist in development of forms and tools to increase Company and operational efficiency
-Manage all staff reporting to the position so as to effectively recruit, train, evaluate, motivate, delegate and monitor their activities.
- Keep the manager informed of task accomplishment, issues and status
- Work closely with Country managers on vendor selection, management and pricing
-Provide status reporting of team activities against the program plan or schedule
- Monitoring, measure and manage performance and service quality of the team
- Coordinate meetings with the Global Manager to discuss any type of impediments,
- needed resources or issues/delays in completing the task
- Monitor the progress of jobs and services throughout the region - Planning, Execution and Billing.
- Systematic review of the jobs to identify any challenges before hand and discuss the same with team - Proactive and not reactive
- Establish times, places and agendas for planning of the jobs and discuss any challenges with the jobs
- Develop processes, design documentation standards, techniques and tools to support task performance.

item.title: Relocation Coordinator
item.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS:
Confirming receipt of service initiations with Clients/RMCs within one business day;
Opening a new v3 job for all initiations within one business day, unless it has been done by relocation assistant;
Confirm billing details and service and fees with service initiation if not specified by SLA;
Ensuring that all online systems, forms, and procedures are completed as per the relevant RMCs SLA in advance of invoicing;
Achieve a minimum of 95% satisfaction rate from all assignees via customer evaluation reports
Manage a casesload of between 45-65 active cases per month
Making initial contact to any new Assignee to their destination within one business day of initiation;
Inform assignee and queries will be responded to within 4 working hours
Assigning the newly initiated service to the local Destination/Immigration Consultant or on call vendors and briefing them on important service details;
Explaining to the assignee Move One’s relationship to their employer and/or the RMC, confirming the service to be provided, sending needs questionnaires, asking about critical elements of the relocation, and promotingavailable based on destination, as a valuable pre-arrival resource (preferably via telephone and not just email);
Providing clear and timely updates and service reports to Move One clients and RMCs;
Following up with the Assignee at the midway point of the service to provide an opportunity for the Assignee to offer feedback on Move One’s performance to date;
Immediately informing the Move One client/RMC of any service related complaints, issues or challenges, as well as to the Country Manager of any service issues;
Immediately notifying the ME Regional Operations Manager of any service issues or escalations brought to their attention by an RMC;
Collecting feedback on the Destination/Immigration Consultant and on call vendors and reporting to the Country Manager of any service issues arising from those feedback reports;
Ensuring that Destination templates, information in V3 and on Move One website is always up to date as well as the Welcome Package in their assigned destinations;
Confirming that all required documents are uploaded in accordance to document naming protocol and information are stored as part of the job in v3 and then closing the job.
Ensuring that all services are invoiced within the shortest possible time after the service is completed, and sending an accurate invoice to the client/RMC within 5 working days of service completion in accordance with clSupporting the Destination/Immigration Consultant and on call vendors with guidance, advice, and training during the service;
Monitoring the Destination Consultant’s and on call vendors' reporting in v3;
Conducting bi-monthly staff meetings/calls covering scheduling, training updates, and operational reminders, with all local Destination/Immigration staff and vendors, including potential phone meetings with any consulEnsuring that Destination staff and vendors complete any updated training programs by the assigned deadline;
Tracking upcoming expiration dates in v3 and notifying the appropriate contact (local HR, Lead Consultant, or Regional Coordinator) of any expiration date notices;
Monitor and control costs related to job performance
Monitor expense management of RMC´s clients when applicable (e.g. saving on rental)
Updating general client specific information based on the client alignment
Confirming receipt of client requests for destination/immigration information and rates on the day received (within one business day) and then preparing and responding to client requests within one business day or withRecording vital service related information in v3, and monitoring data entered by the Consultant and on call vendors (comments, statuses, time-tracker, costs, other fields, and closing jobs;
Creating and submitting various operational reports and updates as required by the Country Manager, Key Account Manager, and Product Manager as required;
Representing Move One at expat events in their location as needed;
Visiting their assigned destination as necessary for training and to better understand the destination as Coordinator;
Supporting local business development staff by attending meetings with potential clients as required;
Meeting, as required, with representatives of the preferred vendors to ensure a positive working relationship;
Monitoring holiday/vacation scheduling for the local Destination/Immigration Consultant and on call vendors in their destination to avoid staffing shortages;
Completing any client forms related to the service;
Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments;
Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers;
Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations.
Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision.
Other duties as assigned.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2022-09-22
Job Location: Slovak Republic
Job Role: Customer Service and Call Center

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Degree: Bachelor's degree

item.title: Relocation coordinator - Serbia
item.description:
POSITION TITLE: Relocation Coordinator
DEPARTMENT NAME: Mobility Services
REPORTS TO: Regional Manager Mobility services - Balkan, EE, CA & Azerbaijan
WORK LOCATION: Belgrade, Serbia
 
POSITION PURPOSE:  The Move One Relocation Coordinator  is the senior member of the relocation team and is the primary point of accountability for Move One's relocation clients in their assigned destination:
 
RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS: 
Conducting bi-monthly staff meetings covering scheduling, training updates, and operational reminders, with RM and relocation consultant, including phone meetings with any consultants in other cities;
Collecting feedback on the vendors and reporting to the Regional Manager of any service issues arising from those feedback reports;
Meeting, as required, with representatives of the preferred vendors to ensure a positive working relationship; Coordination of vendor's work and activities
Insuring that relocation templates, information inV3 and on Move One website is always up to date;
Monitoring the holiday scheduling of relocation assignments to avoid staffing shortages;
Assigning locally booked relocation services ;
Immediately advising the client of any service related complaints, issues or challenges;
Immediately notifying the Regional Manager of any service issues or escalations brought to their attention by  an client;  
Supporting the Consultant with guidance, advice, and training during the service;
Monitoring the Consultant’s reporting in V3;
Supporting local business development staff by attending meetings with potential clients as required;
Creating and submitting operational reports and updates as required by the Regional Manager
Supporting AR staff with the pursuit of any client invoices over 30 days past due;
Confirming receipt of client requests for rates or immigration and  destination information on the day received;
Responding to client requests for rates or immigration and destination information within one business day.
Representing Move One at expat events in their location as needed;
Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments;
Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers;
Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations;
Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision;
Contacting the assignee and clearly explaining the service to be provided and any related procedures and time lines;
Verification of answers initial questions and identification of the applicable full procedure.
Verification of special needs, interests, or requirements with the assignee, customer and HR manager, before and during the immigration service;
Provide clear guidance on the procedure, requirements, time lines, and documents required for the process with indication who provides documents, what format and specific requirements for documents.
Discussing and confirming service needs, interests and requirements with the Assignee and establishing the “Service Key”;
Provide field work whenever required (authority visits and similar)
Work with real estate agents as and when appropriate to ensure the properties selected meet the budget and requirements         of the Assignee and that appointments run to schedule;
Ensure knowledge of any client specific policies and service requirements. Completing any client forms related to the service;
Act as a  subject matter expert in terms of local area in respect of housing, schooling, recreational and leisure amenities etc.;
Maintaining consistent contact with the assignee, customer and HR Manager throughout the service;
Recording vital service related information in V3 daily by completing comments, statuses, time-tracker, costs other fields;
Verification of answers initial questions and identification of the applicable full procedure.
Verification of special needs, interests, or requirements with the assignee, customer and HR manager, before and during the immigration service;
Immediately notifying Regional manager of any issues or challenges that may arise during a relocation service and documenting the issues/challenges in V3 and placing the service alert;
Maintaining regular communications with the local immigration/labour authorities and remaining up to date on the immigration and  labour regulations related to foreigners in their location; Reading regularly press and orders with information connected with immigration procedures. Updating manager on any changes in the related law;
Maintaining up-to-date knowledge and awareness of their destination city by reading expat websites and publications; Updating manager / Coordinator on any changes related;
Completing any client forms related to the service;
Assisting with any surveys or requests for immigration related information for their destination.
Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments;
Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers;
Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations;
Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision;
Obtaining invoices, acts, SF from vendors, arranging payments to vendors ( sending requests to accounting team for payment arrangements, providing job numbers, obtaining acts, sf from vendors)
Providing cash reports to accounting with job numbers on the forms required by employer
Coordination of trips of in-house courier
Other duties as assigned.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2022-08-23
Job Location: Serbia
Job Role: Customer Service and Call Center

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career

item.title: Immigration Coordinator
item.description:
POSITION PURPOSE
The Move One Immigration Coordinator is the primary point of accountability for Move One's immigration clients in their assigned destination and for the assignee during any immigration service.
 
WHAT YOU WILL DO ON A REGULAR BASIS
Stay abreast of changes in the country immigration laws and practices, changes in the immigration legislation and reporting on new requirements / changes to all the interested parties (Immigration Team /Key Accounts Manager/Country Manager / Product Manager / Clients);
Provide reliable, concise and correct immigration advice (written and verbal) at all times.  Within 24 hours of RMC/Client initiation, send Immigration plan to assignee (including timeline and required documents).  Verification of answers initial questions and identification of the applicable full procedure. Verification of special needs, interests, or requirements with the assignee, customer and HR manager, before and during the immigration service;
Make every attempt (in within the agreed system with the RMC)  to speak directly with assignee soon after the processes overview has been provided  to ensure they clearly understand the Immigration Service we provide and the plan.  Within 48 hours of sending the processes overview, a call with the assignee should be scheduled (under the terms of RMC and if agreed with RMC) to discuss the details of the Immigration Plan.
Maintain regular contact with the assignee, customer and HR Manager throughout the service;
Immediately advising the client of any service related complaints, issues or challenges; Immediately notifying the Operations Manager of any service issues or escalations brought to their attention by a client; documenting the issues/challenges in V3 and placing the service alert; Excellent Customer Service to ensure customer issues are resolved.
Recording vital service related information in V3 daily by completing comments, statuses, time-tracker, costs other fields; Uploading service related documents to V3 including permits copies, passports, corporate documents, and all other documents received for application processing;
Prepare necessary applications, forms and submission at the appropriate authorities in order to obtain permits and documents related to foreign worker's legal stay in the location;
Ensure that all services are invoiced within the shortest possible time (not later than 48hrs after the service is complete), in accordance with clients billing requirements;
Ensure that immigration templates, information in V3 and on Move One website is always up to date; Updating client specific information based on client alignment;
Track upcoming expiration dates in V3 and notifying the appropriate contact (local HR, Lead Consultant, or HQ Regional Coordinator) of any expiration date notices; Completing any client forms related to the service and weekly reporting and calls wit RMCs. Providing clear and timely updates and service reports to any Move One clients for whom they are providing services;
Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations; Supporting  business development by attending meetings with potential clients as required;
Maintain regular communications with the local immigration/labor authorities and remaining up to date on the immigration and labor regulations related to foreigners in their location; Reading regularly press and orders with information connected with immigration procedures. Updating manager on any changes in the related law;
Other duties as assigned
 
 

Job Details

Posted Date: 2022-08-22
Job Location: Hungary
Job Role: Human Resources and Recruitment

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career

item.title: Immigration Field Consultant
item.description:
POSITION TITLE: Field Consultant
DEPARTMENT NAME: Relocation/Immigration
REPORTS TO: Team Leader
POSITION PURPOSE: The Move One Field Consultant is a member of the immigration team
And is the primary point of Accountability for Move One's immigration clients in their assigned
destination:
RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS:
Confirm receiving client’s request from Team Leader – 2 hours from receiving it
Asses the case based on existing documents and questionnaires and provide the client with immigration
scenarios and respective rates on the day received – 24 hours from receiving the initiation from the
Team Leader
Responding all client questions relate to the submitted immigration scenarios and within one business
day.
When work order is received- uploading work order in V3
Contacting the assignee (max 24 hours after work order is received) and clearly explaining the service to
be provided and any related procedures and time lines;
Verification of special needs, interests, or requirements with the assignee, customer and HR manager,
before and during the immigration service;
Provide clear guidance on the procedure, requirements, time lines, and documents required for the
process with indication on who provides documents, what is the format and what are the specific
requirements for each document.
Upon clarifying the procedure to be followed initiate the Field Consultant and place clear work order for
booking appointment with authorities
Announcing assignee and client about scheduled appointments with authorities and maintain contact
with all involved parties for managing to ensure proper attendance at the moment of application
Communicate with the Field Consultant on missing documents and communicating with
assignee/HR/client in order to make sure all necessary documents are provided
Recording vital service related information in V3 daily by completing comments, statuses, time-tracker,
costs other fields;
Uploading service related documents to V3 including permits copies, passports, corporate documents,
and all other documents received for application processing;
Providing clear and timely updates and service reports to any Move One clients for whom they are
providing services;
Tracking upcoming expiration dates in V3 and notifying the appropriate contact (Local HR,
Immigration Consultant or Team Leader) of any expiration date notices;
Immediately notifying their local Team Leader of any issues or challenges that may arise during an
assignment and documenting the issues/challenges in V3 and placing the service alert;
Monitor and control costs related to job performance
Cooperate with partner on job/service related payments arrangements and additional charges, in
addition to pre-approvals arrangements
Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments;
Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers;
Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work
efforts with other employees and organizations.
Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision.
Other duties as assigned.

item.title: Relocation consultant (part time, 20 hours per week) - Skopje, Macedonia
item.description:
POSITION TITLE: Relocation Consultant (part time)

DEPARTMENT NAME: Mobility services

REPORTS TO: Regional Manager Mobility services - Balkan, EE, CA & Azerbaijan

WORK LOCATION: Skopje, Macedonia
 

POSITION PURPOSE: The Move One Relocation Consultant is the primary point of contact for the assignee during any immigration/destination service.  The responsibilities of the Relocation Consultant include:
 

RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS:



Contacting the assignee and clearly explaining the service to be provided and any related procedures and time lines;

Verification of answers initial questions and identification of the applicable full procedure;

Verification of special needs, interests, or requirements with the assignee, customer and HR manager, before and during the immigration service;

Provide clear guidance on the procedure, requirements, time lines, and documents required for the process with indication who provides documents, what format and specific requirements for documents;

Discussing and confirming service needs, interests and requirements with the Assignee and establishing the “Service Key”;

Work with real estate agents as and when appropriate to ensure the properties selected meet the budget and requirements of the Assignee and that appointments run to schedule;

Ensure knowledge of any client specific policies and service requirements. Completing any client forms related to the service;

Act as a subject matter expert in terms of local area in respect of housing, schooling, recreational and leisure amenities etc.;

Maintaining consistent contact with the assignee, customer and HR Manager throughout the service;

Recording vital service related information in V3 daily by completing comments, statuses, time-tracker, costs other fields;

Uploading service related documents to V3 including permits copies, passports, corporate documents, and all other documents received for application processing;

Uploading service related documents to V3 including corporate documents, property offers, itineraries, lease agreements, termination notices, HOP documents, and all other documents received;

Preparing all necessary applications, forms and submission at the appropriate authorities to obtain permits or other documents related to foreign worker's legal stay in their location;

Providing clear and timely updates and service reports to any Move One clients for whom they are providing services;

Tracking upcoming expiration dates in V3 and notifying the appropriate contact (local HR, Lead Consultant, or HQ Regional Coordinator) of any expiration date notices;

Immediately notifying their local Lead Consultant and/or their Regional Coordinator of any issues or challenges that may arise during a relocation service and documenting the issues/challenges in V3 and placing the service alert;

Maintaining regular communications with the local immigration/labor authorities and remaining up to date on the immigration and labor regulations related to foreigners in their location; Reading regularly press and orders with information connected with immigration procedures. Updating manager on any changes in the related law;

Maintaining up-to-date knowledge and awareness of their destination city by reading expat websites and publications; Updating manager / Coordinator on any changes related;

Completing any client forms related to the service;

Assisting their Lead Consultant, Operations Manager, or Regional Coordinator with any surveys or requests for immigration related information for their destination;

Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments;

Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers;

Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations;

Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision;

Other duties as assigned.
 
 
 
 

 

Job Details

Posted Date: 2022-08-12
Job Location: Macedonia
Job Role: Customer Service and Call Center

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Entry Level

item.title: Relocation Consultant - Serbia
item.description:
POSITION TITLE: Relocation Consultant



DEPARTMENT NAME: Global mobility

REPORTS TO: Regional Operations Manager



LOCATION: Serbia, Belgrade
 

POSITION PURPOSE: The Move One Relocation Consultant is the primary point of contact for the assignee during any immigration/destination service.  The responsibilities of the Relocation Consultant include:
 

RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS:


 


Perform the tasks as assigned by Relocation coordinator and related to:


Application preparation, downloading documents from client’s portals, renaming and uploading documents to V3, canning documents and preparing application packages


Preparing and maintaining physical files of document for each assignee – preparing application packages based on check list


Arranging government fee payment by generating payment slips via government portal – giving instruction to accounting team to make the payment


Obtaining payment confirmations from the bank


Cost recording in the system


Sending documents to translator


Uploading translation invoices to the respective jobs on monthly basis (once received from translator)


Arranging courier service


Drafting immigration documents (company statements and letters, authorizations, power of attorneys and other drafts needed to be signed by company/assignee)


Communicate with assignee on the process and any pending requirements, time lines, and updates


Announce assignee and client about scheduled appointments with authorities and maintain contact with all involved parties for managing to ensure proper attendance at the moment of application


Accompany applicant to the immigration office


Recording vital service-related information in V3 daily by completing comments, statuses, time-tracker, costs other fields; Uploading service-related documents to V3 including permits copies, passports, corporate documents, and all other documents received for application processing;


Providing clear and timely updates and service reports to any Move One clients for whom they are providing services;


Tracking upcoming expiration dates in V3 and notifying the appropriate contact of any expiration date notices;


Immediately notifying Relocation coordinator of any issues or challenges that may arise


Monitor and control costs related to job performance


Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments;


Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers;


Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations.


Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision.


Other duties as assigned.



Verification of special needs, interests, or requirements with the assignee, customer and HR manager, before and during the immigration service;

Provide clear guidance on the procedure, requirements, time lines, and documents required for the process with indication who provides documents, what format and specific requirements for documents;

Discussing and confirming service needs, interests and requirements with the Assignee and establishing the “Service Key”;

Work with real estate agents as and when appropriate to ensure the properties selected meet the budget and requirements of the Assignee and that appointments run to schedule;

Ensure knowledge of any client specific policies and service requirements. Completing any client forms related to the service;

Act as a subject matter expert in terms of local area in respect of housing, schooling, recreational and leisure amenities etc.;

Maintaining consistent contact with the assignee, customer and HR Manager throughout the service;

Recording vital service related information in V3 daily by completing comments, statuses, time-tracker, costs other fields;

Uploading service related documents to V3 including permits copies, passports, corporate documents, and all other documents received for application processing;

Uploading service related documents to V3 including corporate documents, property offers, itineraries, lease agreements, termination notices, HOP documents, and all other documents received;

Preparing all necessary applications, forms and submission at the appropriate authorities to obtain permits or other documents related to foreign worker's legal stay in their location;

Providing clear and timely updates and service reports to any Move One clients for whom they are providing services;

Tracking upcoming expiration dates in V3 and notifying the appropriate contact (local HR, Lead Consultant, or HQ Regional Coordinator) of any expiration date notices;

Immediately notifying their local Lead Consultant and/or their Regional Coordinator of any issues or challenges that may arise during a relocation service and documenting the issues/challenges in V3 and placing the service alert;

Maintaining regular communications with the local immigration/labor authorities and remaining up to date on the immigration and labor regulations related to foreigners in their location; Reading regularly press and orders with information connected with immigration procedures. Updating manager on any changes in the related law;

Maintaining up-to-date knowledge and awareness of their destination city by reading expat websites and publications; Updating manager / Coordinator on any changes related;

Completing any client forms related to the service;

Assisting Operations Manager, or Relocation Coordinator with any surveys or requests for immigration related information for their destination;

Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments;

Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers;

Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations;

Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision;

Other duties as assigned.

item.title: Regional Manager Destination Services - Poland(copy)
item.description:
DESIGNATION: Regional Manager Destination Services - Poland
 
DEPARTMENT: Relocation
 
REPORTS TO: Global Head - Mobility Services 
 
LOCATION:  Poland
 
POSITION PURPOSE:  
Manage the operations team to ensure consistent and high quality service delivery to our clients. This includes identifying the key success factors in performing this role and finding high quality staff, developing and delivering a training program and performing audits of service delivery execution.
 
WHAT YOU WILL DO ON A REGULAR BASIS
Train and develop a diverse team eager to meet and/or exceed our client’s expectations and support in client retention. 
Create a comprehensive training program for the operations team (should include system training, templates review, briefing call presentations, presentation guidelines, RMC SLAs overview, identify cost savings, identify process improvement and key milestone touch points in service delivery during orientations, school searches, home searches, ad settling-in service). Additionally, the training should consist of case studies and role plays to solidify the concepts for high quality service delivery. Ensure operational procedures and practices are well defined, documented and consistently applied
Understand Move One customers service-level agreements (SLA) that defines the level of service expected from Move One team. Paying attention to the metrics by which service is measured, as well as understanding the service-watch criteria and penalties if the agreed service levels are not achieved.
On a monthly basis monitor the service delivery of coordinators by running briefing call checks, quality check calls for all the cases to ensure world class service.
On bi-monthly basis audit the open jobs, monitor estimated revenue and cost in the jobs,  send the monthly projection report of that month to your reporting manager beginning of each month. Understand our costs and ensure proper financial controls are in place for all processes.
Monitor our process of invoicing, ensuring we invoice and are paid in timely manner. The payment terms for each client must be well understood and adhered to. Support AR team in chasing difficult customers with outstanding payments. 
Lead daily staff meetings to discuss the booked jobs, flagged cases, successes, questions and concern.
Develop metrics to measure performance expectations and review with coordinators on a monthly basis along with their caseload review.
Take responsibility for customer escalations and act as a point of escalation both in and out of hours as required. Conduct a root cause analysis to understand the primary source of escalation. Develop corrective action and process improvement plan, ensuring operational processes are continually improved.
Follow the global processes and collaborate with colleagues in other regions to make sure we deliver superior service as a global team.
Other duties as assigned
 
 

Job Details

Posted Date: 2022-08-12
Job Location: Poland
Job Role: Management

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career

item.title: On Call Destination Consultant - Poznan , Poland
item.description:
POSITION PURPOSE


Move One’s Relocation Consultants support new expatriates and their families prior to their assignment by introducing them to the community, show them potential neighborhoods, support them with finding a home and sourcing schools and become familiar with the area, culture and customs. Once the expatriate and/or family relocate, the consultant and relocation team continue to offer support services to ensure a smooth settling in process.


 


RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES/FUNCTIONS TASKS


Answer any queries, which the transferee may have about the relocation process and his/her expectations about the new location.


Find neighborhoods, residences, schools/childcare for the transferee relevant to their needs and priorities, coordinating with the relocation team to provide optimum service. Coordinate all relevant visits and a suitable itinerary for the transferee based on the agreed services. These visits include, but are not limited to, rental properties, schools, neighborhoods, clubs, etc.


Keep in constant communication with your assigned transferee(s) so that the most suitable itinerary is presented that meets their needs and expectations.


Accompany the transferee on each day’s orientation, home-finding or school search and/or settling-in or familiarization tour.


Follow up to answer additional questions and inform the relocation team and your assigned in-house Relocation Coordinator of the outcome, questions, challenges, needs analysis, follow up schedule, etc.


 


All Move One Employees and Consultants are expected to:


Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments.


Interact professionally with Move One employees, customers and suppliers.


Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with Move One employees and organizations.


Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision.


 


SKILLS


Excellent and effective written and verbal communication skills (in English as main language) as most of the job revolves around communication with the transferee, colleagues and third party companies/agents


Must be able to meet deadlines and be able to associate well with the transferees and their family members to ensure that the relocations process works to fit their requirements, but above all, be sensitive to their needs both personally and professionally.


Must be an organized person and able to multitask to coordinate a smooth relocation process.


Must be able to negotiate and problem solve effectively and be able to read a situation that may be providing stress to the transferee and their family.


Strong customer service orientation.


International relocation experience is a plus.


Good foundation/knowledge about expat living areas and the rental property market.


Inquisitiveness and eagerness to continuously develop self-knowledge in and around the city.


WORK REQUIREMENTS


Move One requires Relocation Consultants to be dedicated to only Move One and not perform relocation or real estate services for other companies at the same time.


Relocation Consultants' workloads are flexible and agreed in advance. Once a Consultant is appointed to a transferee, they are expected to handle the communication and physical service from start to finish. We, therefore, request that Consultants provide the in-house Relocation Team with their set available days and hours well in advance. Consultants are required to be committed to handle a transferee’s support (i.e. 1, 2 or 3 days face-to-face as well as telephone and email communication prior to, during and follow ups) start to finish to avoid disruption or communication and relationship building barriers. Flexible hours have no minimum per month or maximum as they vary based on the Consultant’s availability and the work load.


All members of the Relocation team (in-house or flexible) are required to use the Move One CRM for tracking all work performed, communication about the job, client and transferee data, planned and modified itineraries, feedback and comments about the ongoing service and a full, detailed report upon service completion.

Job Details

Posted Date: 2022-08-05
Job Location: Poland
Job Role: Customer Service and Call Center

Preferred Candidate

Career Level: Mid Career
Degree: Bachelor's degree
